msContents.summary: The life of Saint Nisime is well known for its different fragments in Syriac, Persian and Georgian languages. This manuscript belongs to XVIIIth century in accordance with watermark indicating "1784". This Manuscript consists of four parts with few additions and ornaments. The text is written in Mkhedruli script, while Asomtavruli script is used for titles, the first letters of paragraphs and sometimes for decoration.
